meanings.meaning: 1. rim; brim; edge; brink
1. fate; destiny (esp. as a mysterious force that binds two people together) 金の切れ目が縁の切れ目。The end of money is the end of love.
2. relationship (e.g. between two people); bond; link; connection 戸籍上の縁は切れても、昔日の絆はそのままだ。Our connection may be cut on paper but the bonds of old remain as they were.
3. family ties; affinity
4. opportunity; chance (to meet someone and start a relationship) Only applies to えん
5. pratyaya (indirect conditions, as opposed to direct causes) Buddhism, Only applies to えん, See also 因
6. narrow open-air veranda Only applies to えん, also written as 椽
縁 【えにし】、縁 【え】、縁 【えに】、江に 【えに】
江に: Ateji (phonetic) reading.
